summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue West from West Garfield Street to West Howe Street, and West Garfield Street, West Blaine Street and West Howe Street, each from 11th Avenue West to 12th Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary crosswalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2380 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
